    Game Notes:
    ~~~~~~~~~~~

    Whilst investigating the kidnap of a top scientist Action Man uncovers a far
    darker and more dangerous secret. His mortal enemy Dr. X has devised an evil
    scheme to take over the world and now only Action Man stands in his way.

    AM's quest will take him deep into the heart of three major cities around the
    world. Each one presenting new challenges and obstacles to overcome.

    Dr. X has set some powerful forces into motion. Can Action Man uncover his
    plans and stop him before it's too late?

    For much more info: http://www.blitzgames.com/
